content: What iconic fashion item, also the title of a 2006 film starring Meryl Streep, is named after an American magazine?

I'm going to take a guess here. The iconic fashion item you're referring to is probably "The Devil Wears Prada." I think that's the title of the 2006 film starring Meryl Streep. And I believe "Prada" is an Italian luxury brand, but I'm not entirely sure about the connection to an American magazine. Maybe I'm missing something here.
